original_text: But the Lord said to David my father, ‘Whereas it was in your heart to build a house for my name, you did well that it was in your heart.
korean_text: 여호와께서 내 아버지 다윗에게 이르시되 네가 내 이름을 위하여 성전을 건축할 마음이 있으니 이 마음이 네게 있는 것이 좋도다

sentences.original_text: But the Lord said to David my father
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 주께서 내 아버지 다윗에게 말씀하시기를

sentences.original_text: Whereas it was in your heart to build a house for my name
sentences.korean_translation: 네 마음에 내 이름을 위한 집을 짓고자 하였으나

sentences.original_text: that it was in your heart.
